LanguageData.Bumber_UmbrellaEncumbranceCombat.label: umbrella combat encumbrance
LanguageData.Bumber_UmbrellaEncumbranceCombat.descrip: Worse accuracy and aiming speed while using an umbrella to block sunlight or weather.
LanguageData.Bumber_UmbrellaEncumbranceWork.label: umbrella work encumbrance
LanguageData.Bumber_UmbrellaEncumbranceWork.descripti: Reduced work speed while using an umbrella to block sunlight or weather.
